data.actual_result: The tooltip is pushed upwards about 15% of the screen, or 15% downward if you zoom in.
data.expected_result: The tooltip is pushed downward to match up with the buttons
data.short_description: Tooltip moves drastically upward when zooming
data.steps_to_repro: - Hover over the "Mute", "Deafen", or "User Settings" buttons at the bottom. - Use the Ctrl-Subtract key combo to zoom out, WITHOUT moving your mouse.
